job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pAt Kindred we are on a mission to build humanlike intelligence in machinesppnbspppSince 2014 weve been paving the way for a world filled with more powerful and helpful AI systemsnbspWe bring together reinforcement learning machine learning and remote human guidance to create intelligent robots that solve realworld problems alongside humans in complex changing environments like todays supply chainppnbspppThe company is growing rapidly and we are searching for an individual for a highlyimpactful role has great attention to detail is a proactive selfstarter and interacts easily with all levels of a highperformance teamppbrppAbout this roleppAs an Intermediate to Senior Machine Learning Engineer you are a member of our Machine Learning Engineering amp SW Platform team You will design and develop backend infrastructure to support ML efforts amp product features You will be contributing to design and architecture of complex systems that integrate various hardware components You will bring up and balance considerations for immediate and future needs for scalability reliability security and robustness You will closely collaborate with researchers engineers and product managers in Toronto and other officesnbspIn this role you will be part of an oncall rotation in order to service our customers across North AmericappnbspppbrppWhat you bringnbsppulliFamiliar with a variety of Machine Learning tools and packages understand how to properly set up experimentsliliGood understanding of the mathematical and statistical foundations of ML algorithmsliliExperience with various big data tools and cloud technologies that enable training algorithms at scaleliliActively stay on top of applied machine learning and big data technologiesliliDesire to investigate potential algorithmic solutions for a variety of machine learning problemsliliAble to tackle varied problems balancing a longterm mission with shortterm requirementsliulpbrppTechnical SkillsnbsppulliSignificant development experience in Python on LinuxliliReliable production of quality software within time and resource constraintsliliComplete familiarity with modern software development processes such as design documentation code reviews CICD testing project management workflow and source control conventionsliliExcellent analytical problemsolving communication and organization skillsliliBachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent experienceliulpbrppBonus QualificationspulliProficiency with GolangliliExperience with deep learning packages such as Tensorflow or PyTorchliliBackground in robotics computer vision and deep learningliul
